name: automerge
description: automerge is a simple python CLI that automatically merges GitHub PRs. By default it only merges PRs that 1) pass all checks 2) are authored by dependabot 📘 ❣ 💐 🌳

name: flask_rl
description: 🛑 Flask extension + decorator to perform sliding window rate limiting based on request IP address + using pickleDB for persistence ⤴️ ⏲ 📓 🏓

name: jval
description: ✏️ recursively validate JSON data against a schema -- without any additional dependencies 🎀 🦀 🗂 🌔

name: kash
description: 🛹 [junior year CS 389] implementation of a FIFO RESTful cache server + client using crow (C++11) 🕞 🚈 🌴 ↩️

name: mkd
description: 🏬 collection of commands to simplify running common Docker containers 🃏 📸 ♐️ 📏

name: mok
description: 🐸 generate pseudo random data files -- single or in batch. currently supports generating: JSON, CSV, Parquet, and XLSX 🈳 🍇 🎥 👠

name: portfolio
description: 🪩 portfolio webapp -- optionally integrating with GitHub & generating a PDF resume from Markdown. stores parsed data in lists + dicts and renders it dynamically using Jinja2 + HTML + JavaScript  🏎 📼 🚪 ◼️

name: rnb
description: 🏒 offload computing loads to remote Jupyter notebooks and automatically provision Linode GPU instances 🐾 📚 👷 👂

name: sinker
description: 🐾 sync multiple local files / cp with a config 🚥 ⚓️ 🎋 🏄

name: teret
description: ⌚ blogging webapp with a WYSIWYG editor built using Flask + summernote + SQLite (or any other relational database supported by SQLAlchemy) for persistence 📬 🛫 🐲 💄

name: tunez
description: ✨music player webapp built using Flask + HowlerJS + SQLite/SQLAlchemy for persistence 🎷 👊 🎩 🚍
